title: Really unique font. Any ideas?
content:
Any ideas? I think its fantastic.

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419064458im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_3908.png)
author: somelikeit

comments.content:
This is typical of hand-lettering styles of the 1930s, so it may not be a font. This comes close, but is not necessarily cigar-worthy...  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/new-deal-deco-nf/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419064458/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/new-deal-deco-nf/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/new-deal-deco-nf/")
Thanks, appreciate the effort. Think you're right, its something pulled of a front of a book.
